title._content: [Unidentified woman holding a cased photograph of an unidentified solder in Confederate uniform]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified woman holding a cased photograph of an unidentified solder in Confederate uniform] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.8 x 6.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-334. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2012:127). Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army--People--1860-1870. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
